items.sentence: Tom, which do you prefer, girls with long hair or girls with short hair?
Tom can probably pull some strings for you and get you into that school.
I was driving down Park Street when I saw Tom and Mary walking together.
I was planning on going to the beach today, but then it started to rain.
I wish you would tell me what I ought to do in this difficult situation.
Have you already decided how you\'re going to take care of this problem?
I can\'t believe Tom is still talking about what happened two years ago.
I can\'t help you next Monday, but I can help you the Monday after next.
If Tom knew how to swim, he\'d probably want to go to the beach with us.
If you tell your teacher you lost your homework, she won\'t believe you.
